message: Let's split fairly, considering the inflation
I understand the inflation disparity, but I need a larger share to make it worthwhile for me. This offer considers the future value for both of us.
Considering the increasing inflation impact on your side, this is a fair adjustment
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome considering the inflation heavily impacts me at this point, and we both lose if this goes on further.
